short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI assistant available in your browser without leaving to another page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a minimalist looking for an AI assistant that's not bloated with features you don't need? 

Well look no further, Pocket AI Assistant is here for you! It's a simple assistant, insert your API key and you're good to go!

Features
✅ Direct Access to Open AI 
✅ Switch to GPT3 to GPT4 easily
✅ Save your Open AI Key in your local browser
✅ Chat History
